title: @Riot Where is the Karma skin bundle?
body:
Pretty much historically now, ever since we've been receiving new updated splash arts for champions, we've received a Bundle with all of the updated skins in them, but I can't seem to find Karma's skin bundle in the store.
What gives?

replies.body: It looks like the tradition continues!  You should see a bundle for Karma up on the store now!  Let me know if it's not showing for you!
Any chance I can still get this?! I was out of the country when it went on sale. I'm only missing the traditional skin. I didn't know how much I loved Karma until it was too late :(
